name: HoT Kill
description:
Get yourself a spot for your weekly HoT clear.

**⚠️ This is a Kill Run so you should have defeated all bosses before and be comfortable on the roles that you sign up for. ⚠️**

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS** need to have a Power **and** Condi build!

🤎 **Heal Alacrity**
*W1:* Control Seeker on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **VG** and kite flak on <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha**.
*W3:* Push orb on <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200> **KC**.
*W4:* Push and CC Rigom at <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog**.

<:alac_healer:1176639815282856017>  **Heal Alacrity (Tank)**
*W1:* Tank on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **VG** and <:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval**.
*W3:* Tank on <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200> **KC** and <:xera:703930902069117008> **Xera**.
*W4:* Tank at <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014>  **Quick DPS Firebrand**
*W2:* Bring stability for <:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor** and be the main reflect for <:matthias:703930783311593563> **Matthias**.

🩸 **DPS (Handkiter)**
*W4:* Kite the hands at <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**. Otherwise play DPS.

Let me know if you have any questions!
